level.text: The Mayor shall maintain adequate records of declarations of domestic partnership, termination statements, and amendments to declarations of domestic partnership and termination statements.
The Mayor shall report annually to the Council on:
The number of domestic partnerships declared and terminated; and
Utilization of domestic partnership benefits by District government employees.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 32-702.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 9-114
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 9-114, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 32-701.
